feed.title: Lorsalio - Wallpapers, Icons
feed.subtitle: Free downloads, wallpapers, patterns, icons. The wallpapers are created in high resolution 4K and adapted for different mobile devices. Icons are designed primarily for the Android OS, but may be suitable for other OS.

entry.title: Shimu Icon Pack for Android
entry.content:
Beautiful square icons in a frame are made in the color palette of old newspapers, the colors are not bright and do not irritate the eyes.

All icons size 192x192 the drawn manually and therefore will appear on your screen just fine. Convenient control panel in which you will find beautiful wallpapers specially created for icons, the function of requesting missing icons

The icon pack works with most launchers. Some device manufacturers already support icon change out of the box, please check this feature for your device

  • More than 4000 highly detailed icons
  • 29 QHD Cloud Wallpapers
  • Regular updates
  • Request icons tool for order you missing icons

Supported launchers:

  • Action
  • Nova
  • ADW
  • Apex
  • BlackBerry
  • CM Theme
  • Flick
  • Go EX
  • Holo
  • Holo HD
  • Hyperion
  • KISS
  • Kvaesitso
  • Lawnchair
  • Lucid
  • Microsoft
  • Niagara
  • Nougat
  • Pixel
  • Poco
  • Smart
  • Solo
  • Square

Version 2.6.4 October 22 2024

  • Added 10 icons
  • Activities fixes
entry.summary: Download free Shimu Icon Pack for android devices made with muted colors in flat style and themed wallpapers
